code: import request from"./request";export function getSongDetail(ids){return request({url:"/song/detail",params:{ids:ids}});}export function getLyric(id){return request({url:"/lyric",params:{id:id}});}export function getSimiPlaylist(id){return request({url:"/simi/playlist",params:{id:id}});}export function getSimiSong(id){return request({url:"/simi/song",params:{id:id}});}
